name: Arbitrum Charts
description: ARCS is the Utility Token of https://arbicharts.net Token Tracker Website. An will be used to list and promote token on it. ARCS allow users to easy track all tokens build in Arbitrum, Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain blockchain, soon can be added more Blockchains to track. With a clean design and ease of navigation, it wants to be among the most used token trackers, it also has other features, where users can monitor their portfolio, or directly exchange tokens on the website, in complete safety and simplicity.
